span.div: Due to the State of Emergency declared by Governor Cuomo, Deposit CSD is closed from 3/16/2020 to 5/15/2020. Check this link and our FB page for regular updates.

div.span: National Random Acts of Kindness Day

br.span: Please take advantage of our free meal program during our mandated closure. Free to all students ages 18 and under.
Click here to read updated messages about the coronavirus (COVID-19).
Census data is important to school funding. Make sure you count, Deposit!
DCSD is looking for 2 full-time bus drivers.
Stay informed about the recent changes to immunization laws and required vaccines.

div.h3: Proud of our past. Focused on our future.
